name: SailingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Sailing Sounds”
”Alexa ask Sailing Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sailing sounds
des:
Experience the tranquility of sailing on open water with this skill. It includes the sounds of sails flapping in the wind, the creaking of the boat as it navigates through the waves, and the occasional call of marine life, encapsulating the peaceful yet exhilarating essence of sailing.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Sailing Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
